review_text: If you are looking to refresh your mind and mentally reset yourself this is a wonderful place to stay. The forest, birds, walks, deer, chickens, and much more. My only problem not enough time should have booked longer. Wonderful place!
We really enjoyed our stay here. Loved the serene vibes and peaceful surroundings. Lori is a great host and I think anyone will enjoy the cabin‚Äôs intricacies.

Wonderful, peaceful place to recharge. The property is on a peaceful walkable road and is a quick walk from the trails and beach at Jarrell Cove State Park. The house was comfortable and immaculate and the well stocked kitchen was a huge plus. Lori was great to communicate with and even left chocolates she made.

Cabin was just what we wanted to get away from it all. Very quiet and serene. We felt very comfortable here. There were plenty of supplies in the kitchen; no shortage of coffee and tea. The "Happy Anniversary" chocolate was a very nice touch! Walking distance to Jarrel Cove State Park.

Lori was such a thoughtful and great host. The house is immaculate; Definitely the cleanest Airbnb I‚Äôve been in. She has everything you need and was very thoughtful of her guests. The house is on a very peaceful and pristine piece of property. I would love to stay here again.

Top of the class in kindness and communication. Lori was quick to respond to questions and her eye for detail and added touches made my stay a top 5 all time best. Location is tucked away back in the woods and private. Fully tooled kitchen for a cook of any season and a tea collection that would make the most traveled steeper blush with envy.

This is the second time my girlfriend and I have stayed here and it was as lovely as we remembered it! We really appreciate the stocked fridge and pantry. The space feels very homey and comfortable and the chicken/bird decor everywhere makes it feel friendly and lived in. The setting is private and tranquil and just minutes away from Jarrell Cove. We will be back again!
Very communicative host. The cabins lovely. Definitely helped recharged our batteries.. thank you for everything Lori.
Fantastic stay here in Shelton. Although further away from the cities, Lori provided some good local areas to eat and shop. Would recommend for a cozy stay anytime in the PNW

This is an absolutely beautiful spot in a dreamy PNW forest location on a hidden little island in the midst of water & forests & mountains . . . if you're location for the consummate Pacific Northwest experience, this is one great way to do it.
The property was beautiful, and the home was nice and cozy. The surroundings and animal life were fun to watch.
Lori was an amazing host and the house and property is so beautiful and peaceful. The place was clean, well equipped and came with very detailed labeling and instructions. Would highly recommended!

This place has a very cozy and homey vibe to it. Felt like being in my own house.
Definitely wish we could've stayed longer to fully enjoy the place (as well as the rest of the island). Until next time - thanks, Lori!

Lori's place is a perfect getaway. Loaded with amenities and personal touches. Extremally clean and spacious. The property is very well cared for, including her pen of happy chickens. It was a grand treat to stay here! There are also some nice trails at the state parks on the island. We ventured to McMicken Island during low tide, what a wonderful adventure!

Lori‚Äôs place was perfect for a weekend getaway! The house is very clean and inviting. I especially loved the fully stocked kitchen and the hammock on the back porch. The property is beautiful, quiet, and serene. It‚Äôs a great place to relax and unwind!

Beautiful is an understatement when looking to describe Lori‚Äôs home and surrounding area. Everything was clean, organized, free of any odors, free of bed bugs (we checked), and her home felt very cozy. Lori was very responsive and helpful when we asked any questions. Rules of the house were clear, concise and not over the top. She had anything you would need for a comfortable stay. Very transparent in the description.
Her place felt very safe, peaceful, quiet and the view is immaculate. Bed was nice and warm even during cold nights with the blankets she has. Bathroom was clean and the shower was great. 11/10 Definitely recommend staying here especially with the price she‚Äôs asking for. Will be eyeing this Air BnB again if I‚Äôm in Washington ever again! Thanks Lori! üòÅ

We had such a good time at Lori‚Äôs place! The place was clean and spacious, the kitchen was well-stocked and spotless, the house was at such a comfortable temperature. We also watched deer graze the property most mornings and evenings! Such a fun stay, would recommend, and would definitely stay there again!
The house was clean, affordable and comfortable. We had good access to the national and state parks around. Great place to stay in.
If you‚Äôre looking for an escape to a peaceful getaway, look no further! My husband and I have stayed here four or five times and will definitely be back!
Beautiful home, off the beaten path with deer in the yard and a gorgeous forest landscape. Host was thoughtful and communicated well.

Lori‚Äôs place was so beautiful, peaceful, and accommodating! The home has an inviting feel as soon as you walk in. Her place has everything you could need, and she is very thoughtful. I enjoyed that she left chicken treats out to feed the chickens on the property. Lori even welcomed my stay with a ‚ÄúHappy Birthday‚Äù chocolate! I highly recommend her place.

Love love love!!! My husband and I live in Brooklyn, NY and we always wanted to visit the beautiful state of Washington and to get out of the city a bit. After a lot of research, we fell in love with Lori‚Äôs home. So peaceful, beautiful, and breathtaking. She went above and beyond providing us with everything we needed, it literally felt like it was our home! Her home is extremely clean as well. She also has the most adorable chickens we can engage with and feed! They‚Äôre so lovely and have such personalities. We will always come to Lori‚Äôs whenever we go out to Washington. An unforgettable and phenomenal experience.

If you‚Äôre looking for a weekend away in nature, look no further! My husband and I have spent a long weekend in March here every year since 2021 and we look forward to returning next year! The chickens, trails and tranquility are wonderful. Lori is exceptional as a host and is incredibly helpful. I would recommend this stay to anyone looking to escape the city for a few days.
Great places to enjoy the outdoors and to get away from busy city life. I had an amazing time there, and I would definitely love to visit again!

This is a beautiful spacious place that allowed us to enjoy the beauty and peacefulness of the surrounding forest and nearby beaches. The space has many thoughtful touches and is kept very clean and tidy. There is lots of light coming in from the big windows. The kitchen and bathroom are generously stocked. We loved how we were able to make our meals with all the supplies and equipment we could want. The WiFi was great for basic needs and allowed us to stream our favorite shows on the provided TVs. We came during a cold snap and Lori made sure we had access to extra space heaters to supplement the propane furnace and the electric fireplace. It was also fun to visit and feed the chickens on the property. We enjoyed being able to walk the short distance to Jarrell Cove State Park to see the water and walk the trails. Another day we visited Harstine Island State Park, a little under two miles away, and walked one of the many trails down to the beach. We hope to return.

What a beautiful, charming getaway! My husband and I loved our stay at the Island Chalet. The place is so cozy, well-equipped and had so many thoughtful touches. It was a very peaceful location on Harstine Island, and there are several lovely state parks and natural scenic areas to explore. Definitely recommend!

Lori's place was spacious, cozy, and overall very comfortable with lots of natural light and cozy nooks. The house is stocked with everything you might need, from travel books, to flip flops, to cooking utensils. Lori was very friendly and responsive.

This has been one of our favorite airbnbs ever. It really felt like getting to experience a little bit of Lori's life in her house. There are a few things I have to say.
- The kitchen was better equipped than my own back home. It had every utensil imaginable, spices, teas, coffee, appliances. Pretty much every thing I could have imagined using, was available.
- The space was big, but super cozy. There was lots of light coming in through the big windows. The house is surrounded by the forest and it feels super calm and relaxing.
- I had missed this when we book this place, but there are chicken in the premises of the property. They are super friendly and Lori leaves treats for you to give them.
- The decoration was fantastic. It is bird themed. My wife and I were thrilled to keep finding them like easter eggs.
- The internet was fast and reliable. No problem with 2 people zooming at the same time.
- Lori is a great host, super proactive and helpful.
100% recommended!
Beautiful quiet property on easy going island
Peaceful, quiet and beautiful. The perfect romantic getaway. Will be returning in the spring!

We had a wonderful stay at Lori‚Äôs! Overall, the house was very clean, the kitchen was stocked with all kinds of spices and cooking gadgets, and we loved all of the bird themed decor! I would definitely recommend Lori‚Äôs place to anyone who is looking for a secluded and peaceful getaway:)
It is clear that Lori is sharing something she really loves and has spared no effort to make it a beautiful experience for her guests.
A lovely, peaceful setting and a cozy, comfortable house. We hope to return.
Beautiful house
Perfect location to relax and close to two state parks with trails. Very quiet and comfortable.
I loved my stay at the cabin!
This space was amazing. Super clean, and cozy. The vibe was relaxing and peaceful. Definitely coming back

I can honestly say this was the best airbnb i‚Äôve ever stayed in! Everything was so comfortable, clean cozy with a cool modern-farm-chic vibe. I loved the spaciousness of the main room and general layout of the space. The bed was so comfy (with heated mattress pad!) Being out there near the woods, I felt more connected to myself and nature than I have in a while. Wish I had stayed longer!
Great spot

This place is perfect if you want to stay out in the woods. Lori provided us with a clean and safe stay. We were able to communicate quickly when something came up. I definitely recommend this place as she even left some snacks for us. Thank you Lori for this amazing stay.
Clean, comfortable, quiet and serine. A perfect cabin in the woods get away
We loved staying here!
The listing is very accurate accessible via a gravel road. It is a beautiful spot and a perfect location on Harstine.

This is an awesome place, nice and private. Lori was great, super quick responses and had everything ready for us when we arrived.
The cleanliness was top notch.
You can tell this place is cared for and that your comfort is thoughtfully prepared for. If we ever get the chance to come back to Washington we will definitely stay here again!

Just a wonderful experience. I enjoyed the cleanliness of everything, the warmth, the quiet, and so many considerate extras to make my stay perfect. Deer in the front yard every morning and evening, privacy all round, and everything I needed to cook, and relax inside or out. Wonderful!

This is the only place I try to regularly get away to. It‚Äôs far enough away from the city to feel disconnected, but close enough to easily take advantage of its general proximity to so many places to explore. Lori has provided all the amenities we need, and the best addition to the place was the new hammock, where we laid at night when it was clear and watched the stars. As always‚Ä¶ we will be back! :)

Lori is a super host as she was very responsive and accommodating. An absolute haven, the perfect spot for a pieceful getaway. Everything was immaculate when we arrived ang instructions to get there were clear. The house was exactly as photographed architecturally stunning, well thought out layout and well stocked kitchen, equipped with all you need. The best Airbnb experience I've ever had, we would love to go back again! I highly recommend this place!!

Excellent place to stay if you're in the area! It's super quiet, private, clean and, well, just perfect for us! While Lori's place has wifi, be aware that the entire area has sparse cellular service so map your way while you still have service. Think of it as a way to disconnect and enjoy the surroundings! It's a gorgeous area üòç There's not tons of places to get food so we recommend you bring your own by stopping in Olympia. Not a problem for us at all! (We're not super familiar with the area so there may be more we weren't aware of at the time). We did end up having breakfast at the Spencer Lake Bar & Grill, which was surprisingly not too shabby. If you're in a pinch, there's a tiny grocery store across the street from that bar. We had everything else we needed!

This was the best Airbnb we have ever stayed at. Very private and peaceful stay for our 29th anniversary. Lori always responded right away with any questions. I'm not sure why anyone would complain about too many rules. We had no problem with them or following them. If it was my Airbnb I'd probably have the same rules, so keep up with what you are doing, Lori great job! We will definitely be back again!
Everything was perfect. It was refreshing to be able to show up after a long day of travel and have such a nice place to retreat to. We have not used AirBNB before so this was a perfect first for us.

Amazing, peaceful, immaculate home. Everything is thought of and provided. It is in a great location to just enjoy, or be a home base to explore the island. Loved the chickens :) Can't wait to come back!!!

This is the cutest house in such a great location. The woods are surrounding the house creating a very private escape. We drove off island to see some other things we had planned but there is also so much to see on the island. We will definitely be returning. Thank you!

This is a very comfortable, clean place with all the comforts of home. There was not anything we needed or wanted that we didn‚Äôt have. I love the secluded area and the quietness of the day and night there. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Lori's place is a little slice of paradise. If you're looking for a peaceful and lush setting, this your place. The house is so cozy, comfortable and super clean. Attention to detail and all the comforts of home. We can't wait to return.
Lori's place is fantastic. I wouldn't hesitate for a second to stay here again.

Lori's place is the perfect house to stay in. The kitchen is equipped with everything one could need for any kind of cooking. The house is beautiful, private, and perfect for relaxation. Lori was super easy to communicate with, and Harstine is lovely. We will return for another stay.

This place definitely has amazing, thoughtful amenities. The kitchen is stocked with spices, lovely snacks and the host provides eggs from her chickens. The place is well taken care of. The only downfall I encountered is the amount of rules and regulations. I know that's how she keeps her place so nice and I understand that but some of the regulations are a little too much. She doesn't like foods that smell being cooked there like fish or garlic. There's not any good restaurants in the area and I like eating fish and seafood when I come to Washington (I'm from the desert). I was unable to eat fresh seafood during this trip and I found that disappointing.

This is a wonderful place. Very quiet and a great place to get away, yet still not so far from stores or restaurants if needed. The house is very nice and there's plenty of room in the kitchen for cooking.

Had another wonderful stay at this awesome place in the woods. Truly a luxury destination. Kitchen has everything you need to whip up most any meal. Walk in the woods or nest on the couch with the electric fire and streaming services. The chickens are a hoot! Definitely going to go again first chance we get.
Best stay ever!!!

This was a dream come true for a weekend getaway. A beautiful space with so many amenities, and a very communicative host. Quiet and solitude were acheived, it is a very cool location to experience. She also has chickens which was a plus! 10/10

Loved so much about my stay. Cozy, quiet, comfortable, great extras. Wish I would have know. that I would not have phone signal as I am trying to finalize a new job and a move, but was able to work everything out using the landline. Was still able to use my phone to text and of course connect to wifi.
Lori‚Äôs place is very cute and comfortable! It was perfect for a vacation with my partner!
A wonderfully pristine and cozy place to stay. Super quiet and in a beautiful setting. We would definitely stay here again.

Amazing cabin. Seriously, you will regret NOT staying here. It is so private, tranquil and perfect for a getaway from the hustle and bustle. Lori is a wonderful host! She was quick to respond and even came over from her chocolate workshop (by the way, she makes AMAZING chocolates) to help out with a minor issue within 5 minutes of us realizing the problem. Her home is incredibly clean and well stocked if you enjoy making leisurely vacation brunches like I do. The chickens are adorable and will steal your heart! I only wish we could stay longer and recommend this property and host to pretty much anyone.
a truly wounderful place that is great to get away. beautiful and mystical.
We had such a great stay! Lori‚Äôs house was thoughtfully put together. 10/10 would recommend!
This house is beautiful, cozy and comfortable. I loved the fully stocked kitchen as well as watching the deer out on the grass. A perfect place for a quiet and relaxing weekend.
This house is comfortable, welcoming, in a beautiful quiet spot, and Lori made me feel at home in so many ways.
Such a beautiful place! So peaceful it was a great place to get away from the city for the weekend will definitely come back

Everything about the space Lori provides is impeccable. She has carefully arranged everything so that her guests have a seamless, lovely stay. The location is really delightful, being just a short walk to Jarrell's Cove State Park and surrounded by forest.
Super cute!! Wildlife and chickens to hangnout with in a beautiful setting. Cozy place to stay!

My boyfriend and I were visiting Seattle for the first time and didn‚Äôt mind driving long distances. We found Lori‚Äôs home and it was love at first sight. The house is so welcoming, warm and cozy. The view from the porch is unreal and looking up at the stars at night really adds on to the experience. We would definitely recommend Lorins house to anybody visiting the area and wants to enjoy a peaceful stay.
A great location for a quiet getaway in the woods. Beautiful home and beautiful area.

Lori‚Äôs place is perfect. Beautiful space, lovely grounds and very well equipped kitchen and house!
We plan on coming back!
I adore this place! The amenities are wonderful, the house is cozy, you can take a beautiful walk right from the front door. I imagine anyone would love a stay here!

Lori was a great host. Answered all of our questions within minutes. Was able to have a private getaway and not have to interact with the host in person through the entire process (great for an introvert), although I'm positive she would have came by had we wanted.

This was the perfect place to get away to for some rest and reprieve! The house felt as welcoming as my own home from the start. It was clean, cozy, exceptionally well appointed and had thoughtful details throughout. The property felt entirely private, and there was very close and easy access to park trails for gorgeous afternoon walks. :) The chickens were very sociable, and I had a chance to meet Lori as she was dropping a bag of holiday goodies by, who was warm and nice to chat with as well. - I guess I could sum it up best by saying I booked another stay while I was still there!

The house was beautiful, inviting, and very comfortable to be in, and Lori was an excellent host and very accommodating. The kitchen is very well furnished, and the house was clean and well kept. We had a wonderful and restful weekend stay here, and I would recommend it to anyone wanting to get away for a nice quiet stay out of the city!

To say a place is perfect seems like an exaggeration but in this instance it is not mere hyperbole. Lori has thought of everything. The bed was the most comfortable in any rental or hotel we have ever stayed in and includes a heated mattress pad. The kitchen is so well appointed that I wished I had planned more complicated meals to utilize all of the dishes and cookware. I collect glassware and often bring my own cocktail and shot glasses to a rental but no need here as she has a glass for every occasion. It is so peaceful and quiet on the island and so cozy in the rental with a fireplace and hours of entertainment on the smart TV. I highly recommend the nearby Wild Felid advocacy center were you can book a tour to see tigers, snow leopards and other large cats while supporting an awesome nonprofit. The pictures don't due justice to this perfect rental.
Lori's home is wondeful and so clean. I loved that it felt like home and not just a generic house in the woods. Lori was quick to respond with any questions. I can't wait to go back
Lori has a beautiful, private and comfortable home on a spacious and quiet lot. We very much enjoyed our stay and felt relaxed and at home.
Everything is amazing and gorgeous location. Lori is so kind and accommodating. You can‚Äôt beat the price. Will be coming back for sure.
Lori‚Äôs chalet was beautiful! Everything was very clean and well maintained. The house was easy to find but very private. We had a wonderful week at the Chalet.
This is a beautiful location way out on an island near Shelton. With it being on a gravel road, you are guaranteed privacy. This place has a beautiful layout and everything works great.

Lori is a gracious host, responds quickly, and is very helpful. She left us some (very, very good) cheesecake slices! Feeding the chickens was fun and the nearby parks were beautiful. I highly recommend Lori's place. She's kind and a great host!
Great place to stay and perfect for a solo trip. It is a little difficult to find the location at night but other than that 10/10 recommend!

My husband and I had a beautiful anniversary weekend here. The home was very nice - it had everything you needed. It was right in the woods so there were lots of paths and walks,. The history of the area was so interesting - we drove around the island and Lori provided some great books. We will definitely be coming back!

Beautiful, secluded spot with an ornate bird motif and super friendly chickens to visit a short walk from the front door :) The place was fully stocked in the kitchen, bathroom & bedroom. You may not have cell service, but there is wifi so I used Whatsapp for phone calls. Would love to come back, thanks!

Our stay at Lori‚Äôs Airbnb was wonderful. The place is somehow even bigger and better than in the pictures. If you‚Äôre looking for a calm, relaxing, comfortable stay, then look no further. A much needed relaxing weekend getaway‚Äîthanks again!

Such a wonderful place. Clean, comfortable, and quiet.
Funny to hear the chickens happy sounds when they were getting cared for.
Plus we got a very clear sky one night.
Really enjoyed sitting out and seeing all those stars! Beautiful!
Highly recommended for a quiet stay in nature.
Lori is indeed a Superhost.
Looking forward to when we can stay again.

This was the perfect place for our stay on Hartstine Island. It is such a peaceful location and the cabin has everything we could possibly need. This home is a beautiful and well kept place. We will certainly be back when we are visiting Hartstine for an extended stay.
Clean easy to find quiet and relaxing

Wbile the rules seem overwhelming at first, they actually aren't asking too much and once you see the place, you understand. It is a bit secluded, but we appreciated that fact. We stayed in 3 Airbnbs and this was by far our favorite. Probably lucky it was our last stop or the others would have had much lower reviews!

This cabin was very clean, cozy, beautiful, had anything you might need to cook with and was in a quiet area. The bed was comfortable, TV worked properly and the water was warm. The host is very descriptive about the many rules and it is a lot to remember. We found ourselves more concerned with following the rules than enjoying our vacation. If you are not a rule follower I would not recommend this spot. If you are though, it could be perfect for you. It is very secluded and not too close to a lot of stuff, which can be a plus or minus depending on the type of traveler you are or the type of vacation you are wanting. We were a bit disappointed when finding out you had to contact the host to get a key during certain hours to use the washer and dryer. The upstairs was off limits and one of the two bedrooms was locked. We did not need those areas, so I am assuming they were closed off to reduce cleaning after our stay. I will say without exposing personal details about the host, that the host was under the weather so this might not have been a normal thing. If you can get past the strictness of the stay, it is lovely. The host was friendly in our conversations and made the cabin feel like a home. Overall it is one of the nicest Airbnb‚Äôs we have stayed in.

This cabin was a perfect out of the way cabin with all the amenities in the beautiful forests of Washington. It was clear that a lot of attention was put into setting up this spot for their guests as everything was clean and clearly explained in the house manual. Would highly recommend this location to others coming to the area.

Lori's place is just lovely! The home is immaculate and she provides
some lovely breakfast staples to enjoy. The one thing that would
be good to know is there is no cell service, so be sure and get all
the info you need before looking for her home and also getting
into the house. Due to being without cell service for a few days
prior this was a challenge for us. I would highly recommend staying at Lori's.
Highly recommend this place. Absolutely beautiful inside and out. Lots of room to spread out and a quiet location. It's a luxury cabin in the woods.
The Chalet is beautiful‚Ä¶perfectly tucked away in the woods. Lori‚Äôs place is the cleanest Airbnb I‚Äôve rented to date.

This cabin makes an amazing and peaceful getaway surrounded by forest and far away from the hustle and bustle of normal life. The house was immaculately cleaned and organized, and the kitchen was well stocked with everything you need to prepare and serve excellent meals. A great stay!

Lori's place is perfection. If you're looking to be in a secluded, beautiful forest, with a cozy house and all the amenities you can imagine, book now! Her house is clean and cozy and perfect as a base camp for adventures in the OP or as a place to arrive and not leave for 3 days. I appreciated the blue book with all the expectations and explanations of how to use all the items in the house and to keep it nice for the next guest as well. :) Thanks LORI! we'll be back, for SURE.

This was easily one of the best Airbnb's I've stayed in. It was perfect for me. The location is beautiful. The kitchen was amazing. I highly, highly recommend it!

my wife and I had such an amazing trip and a wonderful stay at Lori's place. it was very clean and no details went unnoticed. the kitchen had any cookware we could think of. it was quiet and private with stylish furnishings. we can't say enough good things about this place and would love to stay here again. thank you Lori üòä

One of my favorite Air Bnb‚Äôs. Thanks Lori

At first one may be put off by the idea of the house rules and manual, but we didn‚Äôt feel restricted at all. It‚Äôs basically just treating the house as if it were your own so it can be enjoyed for years to come. We loved going out in the mornings to feed the chickens, and catching a glimpse of deer walking through the yard. We would definitely recommend this place and we hope to be back again in the future!
Love this Airbnb. Lori‚Äôs place was nice and wonderful to stay in. Also got a chance to see a deer up close. Definitely coming back soon.

This was absolutely a five star stay. Lori‚Äôs home is peaceful, clean, and well-stocked beyond belief. Everything you could possibly need is there to stay for a vacation. There are also desks and wifi, so you could easily work remotely if you just need a change of scenery.
Lori is quick to respond via text or phone, though the instruction book provided answered pretty much any questions I had. A huge plus are the chickens on the property! They‚Äôre so sweet and talkative (but not so loud that you can hear them from the house).
Would love to stay here again sometime soon :)

We had a lovely stay at Lori‚Äôs place! It‚Äôs pretty far out (almost 30 mins go nearest grocery store and no cell service) but perfect place to disconnect and enjoy nature. She‚Äôs also well equipped for WFH with 2 desks and pretty good wifi, which we appreciated. Bed was super comfortable!! We also loved the chickens next door and being so close to beaches and trails.
Beautiful nature and home, really enjoyed our stay
Wonderful stay! Housewas very clean and tidy and location is secluded, perfect for a relaxing weekend.

Lori's place was the perfect getaway for a long weekend. The kitchen is large and well stocked for cooking your own meals. The house is comfortable with lots of nice touches and decor. Two state parks on the island, one within walking distance and another just a short drive away. Some on here have mentioned the many rules but I did not find them onerous at all...treat the space as you would your own home and you will be fine. I would highly recommend Lori's place for anyone wanting a few days in the woods!
Great place to have calm and peaceful time out of the busy city lifestyle.
Had a great time on the island, walking to both state parks despite the occasional rain!
Great spot. Cozy and peaceful. Would stay again.
Quiet and relaxing environment in a beautiful home.

What a lovely retreat! Lori's home is immaculate and plush. The kitchen is FULLY equipped. Seriously -- there is nothing you won't be able to cook there. The bed and furnishings are very comfortable.
